--- Neil Swingler <nswingler@...> wrote:
> For the EJB layer, next time I would not test the
> EJBs in the container and
> I would mock out
> the DB layer.
> 

most of the time of running an EJB TestCase is wasted
for getting a connection from JNDI Server, I think you
can run your EJB tests in batch, and It'll be very
faster.
